message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly sought after by many. Considering its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than $100 to you. Let me propose a price of $120 for this exceptional item. I hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible for you to lower the price to $110? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and I'd like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I propose a price of $115. I believe this offers a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. In order to find a balance between value and cost, I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product. I hope this suggestion will be acceptable to you.
